channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Jumper; INC#1492; 06:28PM; 7650 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tW5Rhr; Van Nuys; A male patient is standing atop a five story building, threatening to jump. LAFD is in place with the air rescue cushion to support LAPD operation. LAPD Inc# 3854; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 E237 E239 E37 E39 E81 EM14 RA7 RA81 T37 T39; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0820; 12:27PM; 200 W F St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s7uYO0; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: 48 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The extent of damage to the adjoining units is being determined. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC18 BC6 CM20 CM22 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 EM13 RA38 RA85 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

FIRE OUT Structure Fire; INC#0832; 12:11PM; 801 S Hope St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49hAUod; Downtown; Firefighters ascended to the 16th floor and located a fire out on the balcony of a unit. The exterior sprinkler activated and extinguished the fire. Crews are investigating to determine the extended of any water problems in the unit below due to sprinklers. There are no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC18 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA814 RA9 T10 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - High Rise; INC#0832; 12:11PM; 801 S Hope St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49hAUod; Downtown; 20 story, modern residential high rise building with nothing showing. There is sprinkler activation on the 16th floor with building's fire pump running and multiple alarm activations. Firefighters are investigating and drivers are advised to avoid Hope St between W 8th St and W 9th street due to LAFD apparatus.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC18 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA814 RA9 T10 T9; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0820; 12:20PM; 200 W F St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s7uYO0; Wilmington; The fire extended into the attic of the fire unit. The attic is shared with multiple attached bungalows. Additional resources are enroute. ; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC6 CM20 CM22 E238 E248 E285 E36 E38 E49 E85 EM13 RA38 RA85 SO1 T38 T48 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0820; 12:07PM; 200 W F St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s7uYO0; Wilmington; One story row of attached bungalows with heavy smoke showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN (Updated address) Structure Fire; INC#0770; 12:09PM; 713 W 77th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QIEksX; Vermont Knolls; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the garage, preventing extension to the home and other buildings off the alley. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E266 E33 E46 E57 E64 RA264 RA857 SO1 SQ21 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0770; 11:44AM; 7524 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47fGO7v; Vermont Knolls; Detached garage, to the rear of a one story, single family welling, well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E266 E46 E57 E64 RA264 RA857 SQ21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0158; 04:57AM; 291 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ucjLqe; #HighlandPark; Firefighters found a slow-moving brush fire in steep terrain, with very light wind. Crews surrounded the burning vegetation with hose lines and fire breaks (created with hand tools) and contained the fire to approximately 1.5 acres. It took 52 firefighters 94 minutes to extinguish the flames. No injuries. No structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BP47 E1 E12 E16 E201 E212 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 SO1 T1 T12 T90; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0158; 03:23AM; 291 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ucjLqe; #HighlandPark; Approximately one-half-acre of brush burning on a hill in or near Debs Park. ; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 T1 T12 T90; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange
